name: idsibercoder
description: VS Code extension that mirrors the IdSiber AI Codex experience with DeepSeek integration, context optimization, and workspace-aware tooling.

idSiberCoder.apiKey.description: DeepSeek API key. Leave blank to be prompted on first use.

idSiberCoder.baseUrl.description: Optional custom DeepSeek API base URL.

idSiberCoder.model.description: DeepSeek model identifier to use for completions.

idSiberCoder.enableContextOptimization.description: Enable Codex-style context deduplication and summaries.

idSiberCoder.contextSummaryThreshold.description: Number of turns before summarization begins.

idSiberCoder.contextSummaryRetention.description: Number of latest turns kept verbatim when summarizing.

idSiberCoder.maxIterations.description: Maximum chained tool calls per request.
